snippet: Kei Nishikori saved a match point with a perfect topspin lob and fought back to beat Gilles Muller 4-6, 7-6 (3), 6-3 in the Swiss Indoors semifinals on Saturday....
lead_paragraph: Kei Nishikori saved a match point with a perfect topspin lob and fought back to beat Gilles Muller 4-6, 7-6 (3), 6-3 in the Swiss Indoors semifinals on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Nishikori, Cilic Advance to Swiss Indoors Final
headline.main: Nishikori, Cilic Advance to Swiss Indoors Final
